subnotes.content:
This subseries is arranged in five sections:

Section A - Co-Personal Representatives and the Investment Committee

Section B - Executive Committee

Section C - Finance Committee

Section D - Trustees Committee and Combined Trustees and Finance Committee

Section E - Combined Trustees, Finance Committee and Executive Committee

Each section is arranged chronologically by meeting date.

The minutes found in this subseries document the Committee meetings held throughout the duration of the Trust's fifteen years of operation. These meetings were held in different locations in the United States. Numerous organizational meetings were held at the Trust's corporate headquarters in Miami, Florida in addition to meetings held in New York City; Chicago, Illinois; Menlo Park and Los Angeles, California; Denver and Colorado Springs, Colorado; Dallas, Texas; and Lexington, Kentucky, the site of Calumet Farms.

Only the Trustees and Executive Committees existed during the full fifteen-year operation of the Markey Trust.
